about_the_game:
Am I Explorer, a combination of puzzles, flatformer game and mini-game.
Go on an adventure to find unexpected treasures with Lila, a cute red fox.


One day, Lila decided to go on a trip.
But Lila, who had no luck, was trapped in a cave.
Lila decided to explore the cave and find a way out to escape.
Can you get treasure and escape the cave through lots of traps and obstacles?
It is in your hands whether Lila can escape from the cave safely and get treasures.

Am I Explorer consists of a nine stages.
Basically, in six stages, you have to clear various maps with pushing rocks and jumping up to the platform.
However, you have to clear different min-igames in the other three stages.
Clear all 9 stages and check the ending.

*How to move the rock?
Each stage has rocks of different shapes.
Depending on how you push and stack the rocks, you may or may not go to the next stage.
You can achieve a sense of accomplishment when you solve the rock puzzle correctly.

* Speed is life
Are you Worried about getting sick of ongoing box platformer games?
Don't worry. It includes mini-games that will give you a tension.
Two of the mini-games are games in which you have to move very fast.
Even if lava is chasing you, move calmly. Calm and fast is the only way you can survive.

name: Am I Explorer

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: window 7
  • Processor: i3-8100
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: window 10
  • Processor: i3-8100
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: Am I Explorer is a puzzle platformer game for single player. The control of this game is very simple. With cute fox, lila, let's go on a journey to find treasure.
